column4: Is there a way to restrict a certain application from accessing the internet?
you could set its to have a proxy of some made up IP, it wont connect then
what if it doesnt have proxy support?
then you will have to configure your firewall to block the app / port it uses
that is global menu
http://www.webupd8.org/2011/03/disable-appmenu-global-menu-in-ubuntu.html
